PHRASE.LANG: kName
Go To RC Rally
Go To RC Rally
Aller au RC Rally
Zum RC-Rallye gehen
Vai alla RC Rally
Ir al RC Rally
RCラリーに行く
RC 랠리로 가기
Go To RC Rally
前往RC拉力賽
前往RC拉力賽
kDesc
Compete head-to-head as you challenge your friends or pit your driving skills against the clock as you race your fully customizable RC car in the first race of its kind for PlayStation®Home. [#Legal]
Compete head-to-head as you challenge your friends or pit your driving skills against the clock as you race your fully customizable RC car in the first race of its kind for PlayStation®Home. [#Legal]

Affrontez-vous en tête-à-tête en défiant vos amis ou mettez vos compétences de conduite à l'épreuve contre le chrono en courant avec votre voiture RC entièrement personnalisable dans la première course de ce genre pour PlayStation®Home. [#Legal]

Tritt Kopf-an-Kopf an, indem du deine Freunde herausforderst oder deine Fahrkünste gegen die Uhr testest, während du dein vollständig anpassbares RC-Auto in dem ersten Rennen dieser Art für PlayStation®Home fährst. [#Legal]

Competi testa a testa sfidando i tuoi amici o metti alla prova le tue abilità di guida contro il tempo mentre gareggi con la tua auto RC completamente personalizzabile nella prima gara del suo genere per PlayStation®Home. [#Legal]

Compite cara a cara mientras desafías a tus amigos o pon a prueba tus habilidades de conducción contra el reloj mientras corres con tu coche RC totalmente personalizable en la primera carrera de este tipo para PlayStation®Home. [#Legal]
友達に挑戦するか、時計と対決しながら運転技術を試し、完全にカスタマイズ可能なRCカーでPlayStation®Homeの初のレースに参加します。[#Legal]
친구들에게 도전하거나 시계와 겨루며 운전 기술을 시험하고 완전하게 사용자 지정 가능한 RC 자동차로 PlayStation®Home의 첫 번째 경주에 참여하세요. [#Legal]
Compete head-to-head as you challenge your friends or pit your driving skills against the clock as you race your fully customizable RC car in the first race of its kind for PlayStation®Home. [#Legal]
與朋友一較高下，或與時間賽跑，挑戰你的駕駛技巧，在PlayStation®Home首場此類賽事中駕駛完全可自訂的RC車。 [#Legal]
與朋友一較高下，或與時間賽跑，挑戰你的駕駛技巧，在PlayStation®Home首場此類賽事中駕駛完全可自訂的RC車。 [#Legal]
